title: 1.3 Master Challenge 1
question:
Write a Java program to add two fractions and print the result. Initialize four integers, each of which represents a part (numerator and denominator) of two fractions.

For example:

Note: Do not reduce these fractions. Be sure to test your code for positive and negative integers by changing the values of your initialized variables.
[Hint:If you have two fractions you add them:
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
